Title: Ira
Actors: Unni Mukundan, Gokul Suresh Gopi, Shankar Ramakrishnan, Niranjana Anoop
Plot: Aryan is like every other lover, who finds the world a better place just because of that one person. Life takes a sudden twist when he is implicated of a serious crime which he didn't commit and Rajeev who comes as a savior in his life.
